summary: Create your save with Skyrim Hardcore at campfires and sleeping bags from Campfire by Chesko
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]With this small plugin and using [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49816/?][b][size=3]Skyrim Hardcore - More Challenges[/size][/b][/url][size=3] by marmo1233 and [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64798/?][b][size=3]Campfire - Complete Camping System[/size][/b][/url][size=3] by Chesko you can save near your campfire or sleeping bag.[/size]

[color=#000000][size=2]Technically it contains only the changed formlists with including campfires and bedrolls of Campfire that are checked by the Skyrim Hardcore script.[/size][/color]
author: Vitalyudin
